channel.title: I need help something wrong with my client i think!
channel.description:
ok when im on my server, using my client. i would go to saradomin minigame to go to bandos boss. and my client would freeze and it would say this in the run:
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub3.method454(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub3.java:72) at client.method104(client.java:8005) at client.method146(client.java:11928) at client.method102(client.java:7706) at client.method9(client.java:8656) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4392) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2009, 10:34:00 pm[/size][hr]by the way, my source is ddspeced, i beleive a made version of deltascape.
